title: Sharks
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 493 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 550L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and Q		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and Q		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     Q		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     Q
description: Sharks describes the physical appearances, eating habits, and attack capabilities of sharks. Although sharks are thought of as dangerous killers, only a small percentage actually are. Book and lesson also available at Levels J and Q.
meta: balance, cartilage, confuse, dangerous, dinosaurs, dorsal fin, pattern, steer, surface
Ask and answer questions to understand informational text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Compound Words : Identify and form compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
